metadata.title: CVE-2024-5691 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: By tricking the browser with a `X-Frame-Options` header, a sandboxed iframecould have presented a button that, if clicked by a user, would bypassrestrictions to open a new window. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
